short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extension for creators to mint NFT and accept crypto tips

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Cyber Matrix is the ultimate browser extension for TikTok and YouTube creators who want to monetize their content in new and exciting ways. With our platform, you can easily mint your videos as NFTs and sell them to fans, all while accepting tips and donations in cryptocurrency. Our simple and user-friendly interface makes it easy to get started, so sign up today and start earning money for your creative efforts!
